mapper.select: SELECT * FROM item WHERE item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{itemName}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (item_name, item_price, img_name, reg_date, update_date) VALUES (#{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{imgName}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET item_name=#{itemName}, item_price=#{itemPrice}, img_name=#{imgName}, update_date=NOW() WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
